articles.author: Scharon Harding
articles.title: Bose open-sources its SoundTouch home theater smart speakers ahead of end-of-life - Ars Technica
articles.description: If companies insist on bricking gadgets, this is a better way to do it.

articles.author: Aisha Malik
articles.title: Spotify now lets you share what you’re streaming in real time with friends - TechCrunch
articles.description: You can tap a friend’s listening activity to play the track, save it, open the menu, or react with an emoji.
articles.content: Spotify is adding even more social features as it seeks to keep users from leaving the app to share music. The company on Wednesday said it is introducing a new Messages feature that will let users s… [+1896 chars]
